summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus
13.nxl: Kahurae ianei rerihoni sapani na virus corana

14.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus
14.nxl: Kahurae ianei rerihoni sapani na virus corana

29.nxl: Virus renae sani apana na oko tin-tinia rapeu

30.nxl: Virus renae sani apana na oko tin-tinia rapeu

31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.
31.nxl: na isaka ruata arihoni sae waron rapeu

32.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.
32.nxl: na isaka ruata arihoni sae waron rapeu

39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:
39.nxl: Reiso sani anoo ia isa wain iakihuha te iasinara te ikupui, mo, kahuraesaka na:

40.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:
40.nxl: Reiso sani anoo ia isa wain iakihuha te iasinara te ikupui, mo, kahuraesaka na:

41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.
41.nxl: Rui nipa sinte wani renete hohari na okori (masker). Na oakihuha te iasinara renete hohai na renete ia sia man wain ihainekei.

42.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.
42.nxl: Rui nipa sinte wani renete hohari na okori (masker). Na oakihuha te iasinara renete hohai na renete ia sia man wain ihainekei.

45.nxl: Uainisi iake arihonia ano wani asinara

46.nxl: Uainisi iake arihonia ano wani asinara

49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
49.nxl: Kani ikupu tewa, ne hasae nani inete ruai.

50.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
50.nxl: Kani ikupu tewa, ne hasae nani inete ruai.

51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious
51.nxl: Ia waini isupu virus rei nea mo, inoo tewa ata wain ikupui. Ne masike san rei bisa renae sinia.

52.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious
52.nxl: Ia waini isupu virus rei nea mo, inoo tewa ata wain ikupui. Ne masike san rei bisa renae sinia.

53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
53.nxl: Nene iake mo, hainau arihon mansia hutue. Tau ianei tewa ata ia sia sahoro ikupui.

54.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
54.nxl: Nene iake mo, hainau arihon mansia hutue. Tau ianei tewa ata ia sia sahoro ikupui.

55.nxl: Sondo te sae wani ipakei tau iai

56.nxl: Sondo te sae wani ipakei tau iai

61.nxl: Tampa iese na ihuka mitanunue na ihukai

62.nxl: Tampa iese na ihuka mitanunue na ihukai

69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask
69.nxl: Nipa sinte wani ipakei na renete hohari okori rei nene muie.

70.en: & even on the outside of your face mask
70.nxl: Nipa sinte wani ipakei na renete hohari okori rei nene muie.

81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…
81.nxl: Masike sapan iae sio kupua no tunna mo, bisa rakina tau apia san;

82.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…
82.nxl: Masike sapan iae sio kupua no tunna mo, bisa rakina tau apia san;

85.nxl: Te oakahuu ia isa wain anom runai uai anoe.

86.nxl: Te oakahuu ia isa wain anom runai uai anoe.

89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,
89.nxl: Na sani anei tewa ne akahuu apia waron sinasi rei, oyo akahuu uam anoe.

90.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,
90.nxl: Na sani anei tewa ne akahuu apia waron sinasi rei, oyo akahuu uam anoe.

91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
91.nxl: Onina na virus rei tihoniki mo, kahurae osohu apia rai tau saponi, bayklin, te alkohol.

92.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
92.nxl: Onina na virus rei tihoniki mo, kahurae osohu apia rai tau saponi, bayklin, te alkohol.

93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,
93.nxl: Virus bisa reruei noi apia rai yam nimasa te wanusa san rei.

94.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,
94.nxl: Virus bisa reruei noi apia rai yam nimasa te wanusa san rei.

97.nxl: arenau waron rakahaita na inete iroha virus rei. Sani rei;

99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

101.en: wash with soap up to here
101.nxl: Sohu tau sapon rotu kua rei.

102.en: wash with soap up to here
102.nxl: Sohu tau sapon rotu kua rei.

107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
107.nxl: Pene akahuu uam anoe. Te ia sia man uai anoe. Ne nesi na akahuui sirinia mo, kahurae asohu hanam atua tau sapon ia-ia ee.

108.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
108.nxl: Pene akahuu uam anoe. Te ia sia man uai anoe. Ne nesi na akahuui sirinia mo, kahurae asohu hanam atua tau sapon ia-ia ee.

109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice
109.nxl: Noo sani iahina ahina selamat ulang tahun nai ua.

110.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice
110.nxl: Noo sani iahina ahina selamat ulang tahun nai ua.

117.en: wash the back of your hands

118.en: wash the back of your hands

119.nxl: Sohu hanari wani iake na kitataya tewa mo, sapan?

120.nxl: Sohu hanari wani iake na kitataya tewa mo, sapan?

121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
121.nxl: Sani oakahui nea mo, rapu sohu hanamo tau saponi.

122.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
122.nxl: Sani oakahui nea mo, rapu sohu hanamo tau saponi.

123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.
123.nxl: Pene akahu nipa sinte te masker rei nene muie.

124.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.
124.nxl: Pene akahu nipa sinte te masker rei nene muie.

127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long
127.nxl: Kupue inae bisa remahaiki pani nipae sinte te masker rei anoe sani ipakei potuina.

128.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long
128.nxl: Kupue inae bisa remahaiki pani nipae sinte te masker rei anoe sani ipakei potuina.

129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!
129.nxl: Pesi te papa nipa sinte (masker) wani ipakei renete hohari na okori sani iahana ikitataie nea. Pene pake nipa sinte te masker rei rotu ranie hatae.

130.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!
130.nxl: Pesi te papa nipa sinte (masker) wani ipakei renete hohari na okori sani iahana ikitataie nea. Pene pake nipa sinte te masker rei rotu ranie hatae.

131.nxl: Pake sondo tau ketu utane te ana.

132.nxl: Pake sondo tau ketu utane te ana.

141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.
141.nxl: Pene sama muaine, pirune, kalasi, sondo te mamkusa hana.

142.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.
142.nxl: Pene sama muaine, pirune, kalasi, sondo te mamkusa hana.

143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
143.nxl: Bisa oakahu ruamo uamo anomo tau siumo tewa. Sani bisa mo, rea mana tea.

144.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
144.nxl: Bisa oakahu ruamo uamo anomo tau siumo tewa. Sani bisa mo, rea mana tea.

145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
145.nxl: Huka na raru mitanunue tau siuri te saniri sani bisa una sani rei.

146.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
146.nxl: Huka na raru mitanunue tau siuri te saniri sani bisa una sani rei.

149.en: and after being out in the public
149.nxl: Onuni on noi mui wani mansia hutue.

150.en: and after being out in the public
150.nxl: Onuni on noi mui wani mansia hutue.

153.en: Always wash your hands with soap…
153.nxl: Sohu hanam tau saponi sui osa.

154.en: Always wash your hands with soap…
154.nxl: Sohu hanam tau saponi sui osa.
